column1: Uchi////Machi Cure (raw) - Smoked baby yellowtail with a delicate yucca crisp
column2: sweet sensation of Asian pear pieces
column3: and crunchy marcona almond and garlic brittle. This was my favorite of the night! All my senses were finally awaken from sweet to savory to crunchy and buttery. I couldn't get enough of this dish. Machi Cure is sushi done right.
